set.name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

card.name: Ajani Vengeant
card.property: +1: Target permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. −2: Ajani Vengeant deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life. −7: Destroy all lands target player controls.

card.name: Kird Ape
card.property: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Essence Warden
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Wild Nacatl
card.property: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.

card.name: Loam Lion
card.property: Loam Lion gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Canyon Wildcat
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

card.name: Jade Mage
card.property: {2} {G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Sylvan Ranger
card.property: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ajani's Pridemate
card.property: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

card.name: Qasali Pridemage
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Grazing Gladehart
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.

card.name: Fleetfoot Panther
card.property: Flash When Fleetfoot Panther enters the battlefield, return a green or white creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Briarhorn
card.property: Flash When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Loxodon Hierarch
card.property: When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. {G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.

card.name: Spitemare
card.property: Whenever Spitemare is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target.

card.name: Marisi's Twinclaws
card.property: Double strike

card.name: Ageless Entity
card.property: Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Ageless Entity.

card.name: Pride of Lions
card.property: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Nacatl Hunt-Pride
card.property: Vigilance {R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {G}, {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

card.name: Firemane Angel
card.property: Flying, first strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life. {6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Ajani's Mantra
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Lightning Helix
card.property: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Lead the Stampede
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Griffin Guide
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. When enchanted creature dies, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

card.name: Recumbent Bliss
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Searing Meditation
card.property: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Behemoth Sledge
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink. Equip {3}

card.name: Naya Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Naya Charm deals 3 damage to target creature. • Return target card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. • Tap all creatures target player controls.

card.name: Sylvan Bounty
card.property: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Titanic Ultimatum
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +5/+5 and gain first strike, trample, and lifelink.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Graypelt Refuge
card.property: Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Jungle Shrine
card.property: Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

card.name: Kazandu Refuge
card.property: Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Sapseep Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G}.) Sapseep Forest enters the battlefield tapped. {G}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more green permanents.

card.name: Vitu-Ghazi, the City-Tree
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker
card.property: +3: Destroy target noncreature permanent. −2: Gain control of target creature. −9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

card.name: Surveilling Sprite
card.property: Flying When Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Nightscape Familiar
card.property: Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.

card.name: Slavering Nulls
card.property: Whenever Slavering Nulls deals combat damage to a player, if you control a Swamp, you may have that player discard a card.

card.name: Brackwater Elemental
card.property: When Brackwater Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Unearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Morgue Toad
card.property: Sacrifice Morgue Toad: Add {U}{R}.

card.name: Hellfire Mongrel
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Hellfire Mongrel deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Dimir Cutpurse
card.property: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.

card.name: Steamcore Weird
card.property: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast it, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Moroii
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

card.name: Blazing Specter
card.property: Flying, haste Whenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Fire-Field Ogre
card.property: First strike Unearth {U}{B}{R} ({U}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Shriekmaw
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Ogre Savant
card.property: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast it, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Jhessian Zombies
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Islandcycling {2}, swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Igneous Pouncer
card.property: Haste Swampcycling {2}, mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Vapor Snag
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Countersquall
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Obelisk of Grixis
card.property: {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

card.name: Recoil
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.

card.name: Undermine
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.

card.name: Grixis Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Icy Manipulator
card.property: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Deep Analysis
card.property: Target player draws two cards. Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Agonizing Demise
card.property: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If this spell was kicked, Agonizing Demise deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

card.name: Slave of Bolas
card.property: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Elder Mastery
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, that player discards two cards.

card.name: Cruel Ultimatum
card.property: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.

card.name: Profane Command
card.property: Choose two — • Target player loses X life. • Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. • Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Spite // Malice

alternate.name: Malice
alternate.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Pain // Suffering
Rise // Fall

alternate.name: Rise
alternate.property: Return target creature card from a graveyard and target creature on the battlefield to their owners' hands.

alternate.name: Fall
alternate.property: Target player reveals two cards at random from their hand, then discards each nonland card revealed this way.

card.name: Crumbling Necropolis
card.property: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

card.name: Rupture Spire
card.property: Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped. When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Terramorphic Expanse
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
